titleStmt.title: The loving enemies a comedy : as it was acted at His Highness the Duke of York's Theatre / written by L. Maidwell.
titleStmt.author: Maidwell, Lewis, 1650-1715.
Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692. Virtuoso.

notesStmt.note: Written by Lewis Maidwell, whose name has been given variously as Lawrence and John Maidwell. Cf. Venn, J. Alum. cant.; Summers, M. Playhouse of Pepys, 1935, p. 434-436; BM; Baker, D.E. Companion to the play-house, 1764, v. 1.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
